mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE AS CSDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE FROM (SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ID DESC ) ORDER BY ROWNUM ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{reqpage}*15-15+1 AND #{reqpage}*15

SELECT RNUM, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE FROM (SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, NOTICEDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY ID DESC ) ORDER BY ROWNUM ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{reqpage}*10-10+1 AND #{reqpage}*10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
